overview: For revenge, wealthy Osbert Gault marries Virginia Mynors, the daughter of a woman who had jilted him years earlier. Unaware of Gault's motives, Virginia consents to the marriage for the sake of her impoverished family.
tagline: Jilted by the girl he loves, he waits for 20 years to wreck his vengeance on her daughter.
title: The Daughter Pays
